nodes.documentation: @notice Return the Lido contract address
nodes.name: getLido

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the number of exactly the same reports needed to finalize the epoch
nodes.name: getQuorum

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the upper bound of the reported balance possible increase in APR
nodes.name: getAllowedBeaconBalanceAnnualRelativeIncrease

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the lower bound of the reported balance possible decrease
nodes.name: getAllowedBeaconBalanceRelativeDecrease

nodes.documentation: @notice Set the upper bound of the reported balance possible increase in APR to `_value`
nodes.name: setAllowedBeaconBalanceAnnualRelativeIncrease

nodes.documentation: @notice Set the lower bound of the reported balance possible decrease to `_value`
nodes.name: setAllowedBeaconBalanceRelativeDecrease

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the receiver contract address to be called when the report is pushed to Lido
nodes.name: getBeaconReportReceiver

nodes.documentation: @notice Set the receiver contract address to be called when the report is pushed to Lido
nodes.name: setBeaconReportReceiver

nodes.documentation:
@notice Return the current reporting bitmap, representing oracles who have already pushed
their version of report during the expected epoch
nodes.name: getCurrentOraclesReportStatus

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the current reporting array size
nodes.name: getCurrentReportVariantsSize

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the current reporting array element with the given index
nodes.name: getCurrentReportVariant

nodes.documentation: @notice Return epoch that can be reported by oracles
nodes.name: getExpectedEpochId

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the current oracle member committee list
nodes.name: getOracleMembers

nodes.documentation: @notice Return the initialized version of this contract starting from 0
nodes.name: getVersion

nodes.documentation: @notice Return beacon specification data
nodes.name: getBeaconSpec

nodes.documentation: Updates beacon specification data
nodes.name: setBeaconSpec

nodes.documentation: Returns the epoch calculated from current timestamp
nodes.name: getCurrentEpochId

nodes.documentation:
@notice Return currently reportable epoch (the first epoch of the current frame) as well as
its start and end times in seconds
nodes.name: getCurrentFrame

nodes.documentation: @notice Return last completed epoch
nodes.name: getLastCompletedEpochId

nodes.documentation: @notice Report beacon balance and its change during the last frame
nodes.name: getLastCompletedReportDelta
initialize

nodes.documentation:
@notice A function to finalize upgrade to v3 (from v1). Can be called only once
@dev For more details see _initialize_v3()
nodes.name: finalizeUpgrade_v3

nodes.documentation: @notice Add `_member` to the oracle member committee list
nodes.name: addOracleMember

nodes.documentation: @notice Remove '_member` from the oracle member committee list
nodes.name: removeOracleMember

nodes.documentation: @notice Set the number of exactly the same reports needed to finalize the epoch to `_quorum`
nodes.name: setQuorum
reportBeacon

nodes.documentation:
@title ETH 2.0 -> ETH oracle
 * The goal of the oracle is to inform other parts of the system about balances controlled by the
DAO on the ETH 2.0 side. The balances can go up because of reward accumulation and can go down
because of slashing.
nodes.name: ILidoOracle
